hiring.title: HIRING PROCESS
hiring.short_description: Let's keep it short and simple
hiring.description: We are looking for 100 engineers to join and help us create not only the best team but the best culture. It is about you and your career above all.

interviewing.title: INTERVIEWING PROCESS
interviewing.description: We want to know about you and want to give you all the information you need so you can feel we are here for you. Our core is engineering and we protect it.

payroll.title: On-time Payroll
payroll.description: We believe having your money on time is a matter of respect for your contributions

remoteFriendly.title: Remote Friendly
remoteFriendly.description: We have been through much, engineering works best when you have freedom and your best workplace

training.title: Training support
training.description: Training is part of us, if you have a learning path you want to follow... count us in!

medicalInsurance.title: Medical Insurance
medicalInsurance.description: Unexpected things happens and we provide you with public and private support.

flexibleHours.title: Flexible hours
flexibleHours.description: We don't timebox people, engineering is art... isn't?

events.title: Travel and Events
events.description: We work in many cities and placen, let's jump together for exiciting event!

opening.title: OPEN POSITIONS
opening.short_description: Be the next top notch engineer and show what Nearshore is about
opening.description: Search over our 103 open positions!, have something else in mind? sends us an email at careers@nearshorecode.com
